FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: A delicate veil of glamers can prove as sturdy as iron.
Un delicato velo di insidie può mostrarsi più resistente del ferro.
Ein fein gewebter Schleier aus Tarnzaubern kann so robust wie Stahl sein.
Un voile délicat d’illusion peut s’avérer aussi résistant que le fer.
Un delicado velo de ilusiones puede ser tan fuerte como el hierro.
繊細な魔法の覆いが鉄より頑丈なこともある。
A delicate veil of glamers can prove as sturdy as iron.
Легкая завеса из заговоров порой прочнее железа.
Um delicado véu de glamir pode ser tão forte quanto o aço.

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Other enchantments you control have shroud.
Gli altri incantesimi che controlli hanno velo.
Andere Verzauberungen, die du kontrollierst, sind Verhüllt.
Les autres enchantements que vous contrôlez ont le linceul.
Los otros encantamientos que controlas tienen la habilidad de velo.
あなたがコントロールする他のエンチャントは被覆を持つ。
Other enchantments you control have shroud.
Другие чары под вашим контролем имеют Пелену.
Os outros encantamentos que você controla têm manto.
STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: local filteredCard = FilteredCard() local objectPlayer = EffectController() return (filteredCard:GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) ~= 0) and (filteredCard:GetPlayer() == objectPlayer) and (filteredCard ~= nil and filteredCard ~= Object() and filteredCard:GetZone() == ZONE_IN_PLAY)
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_SHROUD, 1 ) end end

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
Le creature incantate che controlli hanno velo.
Verzauberte Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, sind Verhüllt.
Les créatures enchantées que vous contrôlez ont le linceul.
Las criaturas encantadas que controlas tienen la habilidad de velo.
あなたがコントロールしている、エンチャントされている各クリーチャーは被覆を持つ。
Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.
Зачарованные существа под вашим контролем имеют Пелену.
As criaturas encantadas que você controla têm manto.
STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil and FilteredCard():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and FilteredCard():GetZone() == (ZONE_IN_PLAY) and (FilteredCard():IsEnchanted() ~= 0) and FilteredCard():GetPlayer() == Object():GetPlayer())
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_SHROUD, 1 ) end end
